text: Petar Stipetić (24 October 1937 – 14 March 2018) was a Croatian general. He served as the Chief of General Staff of the Croatian Armed Forces from 2000 until 2002. ==Decorations and honors== On 14 September 1998, Stipetić was named honorary citizen of Ogulin. He was also decorated with several decorations: Ribbon Decoration Order of Nikola Šubić Zrinski Order of Ban Jelačić Commemorative Medal of the Homeland War Order of the Croatian Trefoil Order of the Croatian Wattle Commemorative Medal of the Homeland's Gratitude Source: Source: Source: Source: Source: ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Croatian people Category:European military people
title: Petar Stipetić
